info.task: navigate forwards to collapsed disclosure button
info.title: Navigate forwards to a collapsed disclosure button

setupScript.name: moveFocusBeforeFirstDisclosure
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the first disclosure button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the first disclosure button
testPageDocument.querySelector('#beforelink').focus();

user: Navigate to the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions. Note: it should be in the collapsed state.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions. Note: it should be in the collapsed state.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Name, 'What do I do if I have a permit for an assigned lot, but can't find a space there?', is conveyed
State of the button (collapsed) is conveyed
